summary: The bill, titled the "Stop the Trump Electricity Price Hikes Act," aims to reinstate all financial assistance awards terminated by the Department of Energy (DOE) as a result of the Secretarial Memorandum dated May 15, 2025. This action effectively reverses the DOE's previous decision to terminate these awards, ensuring they continue in effect as if the terminations never happened. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives on October 3, 2025.
